osvSchema.details: Memory corruption in SPS Application while requesting for public key in sorter TA.

version_data.version_value: Snapdragon 8cx Gen 2 5G Compute Platform (SC8180X-AC, AF) "Poipu Pro"

description_data.value: Memory corruption in SPS Application while requesting for public key in sorter TA.

description.value: CWE-120 Buffer Copy Without Checking Size of Input ('Classic Buffer Overflow')

descriptions.value: Memory corruption in SPS Application while requesting for public key in sorter TA.
Corrupción de la memoria en la aplicación SPS al solicitar la clave pública en el clasificador TA.
